Clarify is about providing actionnable answers to questions, such as:

  • Are we doing the right thing?
  • Are we reaching the right people?
  • What could we improve?

I accomplish this by setting clearly who you are selling to and what they are buying.

Often, “what people are buying” may seem obvious at first. However, as there are often multiple ways to sell a product, knowing what each of your customers are really buying allows you to choose and optimize much more effectively.
